Logistics Platform Overview: Streamlining Freight Transport
Optimized Solutions for Carriers and Shippers in Freight Logistics

A comprehensive platform that connects shippers with carriers, ensuring efficient transport of goods.

Carriers:
  • Submit offers on shipments and view all their scheduled deliveries in a clear calendar interface.
  • Manage fleet vehicles efficiently, with recommendations for the best matches between vehicles and shipments.
  • Access performance statistics and receive real-time notifications for new shipment opportunities.
Shippers:
  • Post detailed shipment requests and receive offers from carriers, with a recommendation system suggesting the best vehicles.
  • Track shipment status at every stage and securely manage payments and invoices.
  • Benefit from tailored matches between shipments and available vehicles, optimizing delivery efficiency.

Explore the images below to discover the platform's key features and user interface.

E-Recruitment Platform Overview: Streamlined Hiring Process
The E-Recruitment Platform Enhances the Hiring Experience

A collaborative effort for a better hiring experience.

Job Seekers:
  • Create personalized profiles by uploading resumes and adding skills, experiences, and certifications.
  • Apply to multiple job listings with just a few clicks, tracking application statuses easily.
  • Set job alerts to be notified of new openings matching their qualifications.
Employers:
  • Post detailed job openings, specifying role requirements, skills needed, and salary range.
  • Receive applications and compare candidates, using filters to find the best matches.
  • Track the progress of the recruitment process, from shortlisting to interviews and final decisions.

Explore the images below to discover the platform's key features and user interface.

E-Health Platform Overview: Streamlines Appointment Management
The eHealth Platform Enhances Access to Medical Services and Appointment Scheduling

A collaborative effort for enhanced healthcare experience.

Doctors:
  • Effectively organize and oversee their schedules by prominently displaying the available time slots for appointments.
  • Make it easy for patients to book appointments online.
  • Enhance service efficiency and optimize their time and resources.
  • Receive notifications about patient appointments and updates.
Patients:
  • Enjoy a seamless experience by booking appointments and viewing services at their convenience.
  • Receive notifications for appointments and updates.
  • Log medications with specific times and dates to ensure adherence.
  • Get timely reminders for each dose.

Explore the images below to discover the platform's key features and user interface.

Madrasatic Platform Overview: Streamlines the Reporting Process
The Madratic Platform Enhances Reporting and Issue Resolution

A collaborative effort for a better school environment.

Student:

Students initiate the reporting process by submitting detailed accounts of issues they encounter. Their input is crucial for providing necessary context for resolution.

Coordinator:

Coordinators review submitted reports, assessing validity and relevance. They can validate, request further information, or reject reports, ensuring the right issues are addressed.

Service Manager:

Service managers address issues highlighted in validated reports, investigating problems and compiling comprehensive reports on actions taken for resolution.

Explore the images below to discover the platform's key features and user interface.
